channel.title: Labels on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Labels on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: “What do you do?” vs “Who are you?”
item.description: What’s the first question you ask someone you meet at a dinner party? “Can you point me in the direction of the hummus platter?” Okay, but the second question? “What do you _mean _they don’t have a hummus platter?!” You’re clearly hungry.
